content: 9 knit weave in all ends and wash and block socks row 10 decrease don t forget to make the second sock row 11 knit row 12 decrease pattern and photos by brandy dean for pattern support please email me at row 13 knit ms deandesigns@gmail com row 14 decrease i would love to see your finished socks find me on instagram at @ms brandydean row 15 knit and tag your finished projects with #downtoearthsocks row 16 decrease abbreviations continue working decrease row until 10 sts remain on each needle co cast on k knit k2tog knit two stitches together ndl1 needle 1 ndl2 needle 2 p purl p2tog purl two stitches together pm place marker sm slip marker pu pick up one stitch rs right side sl1 slip one stitch knitwise if the next st is a k purlwise if next stitch is p ssk slip slip knit st st stockinette stitch sts stitches ws wrong side 4 down-to-earth socks © 2023 brandy dean all rights reserved for personal use only 5 down-to-earth socks © 2023 brandy dean all rights reserved for personal use only
